description:
Hadis has been betrayed. An unexpected intervention allows Jill to escape certain death, but drops her into another dire situation. Jill finds herself face to face with an angry dragon, and her powers are still sealed away!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kon`yaku Aite no Oji ga Muchakucha Sugita no de, Mohaya Damatte Misugosu Wake ni wa Ikimasen
My Fiance`s Uncle Is Behaving So Outrageously That I Can No Longer Stand Silently By
婚約相手の叔父が無茶苦茶すぎたので, もはや黙って見過ごすわけにはいきません
